name: vuejs-fundamentals
description: You can find this free course by **Vue School** at [vueschool.io](https://vueschool.io/courses/vuejs-fundamentals).  The course is suitable for developers who do not yet know about Vue.js or are just getting started with Vue.

scripts.push:
git commit -am "$(git diff --name-only | tr '
' ' ')" && git push
